scenarios.title: ML/AI Projects
scenarios.description: End-to-end machine learning workflow from problem definition to production deployment and monitoring.

steps.title: Problem Definition
steps.description: Understanding business objectives, defining success metrics, and identifying data requirements.

steps.title: Data Engineering
steps.description: Data collection, preprocessing, feature engineering, and pipeline creation.

steps.title: Model Development
steps.description: Algorithm selection, model training, hyperparameter tuning, and validation.

steps.title: Model Deployment
steps.description: Production deployment, API creation, monitoring, and scaling infrastructure.

steps.title: Monitoring & Optimization
steps.description: Performance tracking, model retraining, A/B testing, and continuous improvement.

scenarios.title: Full-Stack Development
scenarios.description: Complete web application development lifecycle from planning and design to deployment and maintenance.

steps.title: Requirements Analysis
steps.description: Understanding user needs, defining features, and creating technical specifications.

steps.title: System Architecture
steps.description: Database design, API architecture, technology stack selection, and security planning.

steps.title: Development
steps.description: Frontend and backend development with version control and code reviews.

steps.title: Testing & QA
steps.description: Unit testing, integration testing, automated testing, and quality assurance.

steps.title: Deployment & Maintenance
steps.description: CI/CD setup, production deployment, monitoring, and ongoing maintenance.

scenarios.title: Data Analytics Projects
scenarios.description: Data-driven insights generation from raw data collection to actionable business recommendations.

steps.title: Business Understanding
steps.description: Stakeholder interviews, KPI definition, and analytics requirements gathering.

steps.title: Data Collection
steps.description: Data source identification, extraction, validation, and quality assessment.

steps.title: Analysis & Modeling
steps.description: Statistical analysis, trend identification, predictive modeling, and insights generation.

steps.title: Visualization
steps.description: Dashboard creation, report generation, and interactive visualization development.

steps.title: Implementation
steps.description: Automated reporting, stakeholder training, and ongoing analytics support.
